name: Final Jam Charging, Charging Adventure
description:
Hello 

Controls (WASD) Movement , (Jump) Space

collect 54 coins and a key item collected to win the game

My Game is about a little charging Hero. Spinning around and collecting coins to unlock the the castle at the end of the game.

Music from YouTube sound library

I was trying to make a game that remind me of Super Mario.  I also added Sci Fi theme stuff to the game because I also enjoy that as well.
